Entries.Description: From this version on, the Toolkit no longer supports Visual Studio 2017.
Fix problem where dropdown controls would not open, and UI controls would flicker when shown on secondary displays. This mostly affected the Publish to AWS settings screen.

Fixes case where the Publish to AWS summary screen was unable to open the CloudFormation stack viewer for a profile/region combination that did not match what is currently selected in the AWS Explorer.
Add support for publishing .NET 6 applications to Linux based Beanstalk images in the Publish to AWS experience
The Publish To Beanstalk experience no longer defaults to using self-contained deployment bundles when publishing .NET 6 projects to Linux images.
Publish to AWS experience can now publish images to ECR Repositories
